bif.title: Ten Years in South Africa Vol. 2

Narrative of Voyages to Explore the Shores of Africa, Arabia, and Madagascar; Performed in H.M. Ships Leven and Barracouta, Under the Direction of Captain W.F.W. Owen, R.N. By Command of the Lords Commissioners of the Admiralty. (Volume 1).
Life in the Wilderness; or Wanderings in South Africa
